model_answer: B: To explain that architects in the Philippines are restricted from advertising in traditional media, while social media creates a gray area about showcasing work.

Answer: B: They help clients who struggle to understand computer renderings visualize the design, as shown by people examining and interacting with models.

The speaker mentions that physical models are useful because they allow clients who have trouble visualizing designs created on computers to see and interact with the design in a tangible way. This helps clients better understand the design and its features. The fact that people are examining and interacting with the models reinforces this point by showing that the models are effective in communicating the design to others.
